long_description: Survival expert Tony Nester shares his strategies for upping the odds in your favor when faced with dire circumstances. Author: Tony Nester. Softcover; 57 pages; black-and-white photographs. Diamond Creek Press; copyright 2007. Focuses on the mindset of successful survivors and what it takes to prepare for a disaster. Includes methods to formulate an escape plan for your specific region and what an evacuation entails. Contains emergency kit suggestions for the home, office and vehicle, and what to include in a first-aid kit. Explains proven techniques for obtaining safe drinking water and avoiding dehydration and much more.
